title: Super spicy Quorn® chilli
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '3 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 red onion, chopped', '400g Quorn® mince', '2 Scotch bonnet chillies, chopped', '2 teaspoons cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon paprika', '3 tablespoons tomato purée', '1 (400g) tin passata', '1 vegetable stock cube', '250ml water', '2 (400g) tins red kidney beans, rinsed and drained']
